sentences.en: ...a supply vessel for oil rigs in the Gulf of Mexico.
sentences.cn: …一艘墨西哥湾石油钻塔的供给船。

sentences.en: As soon as I get to the rig, I'll come down in the sub, okay?
sentences.cn: 我一到钻油台之后就开潜艇下来, 好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Diesel generators are very important equipments on drilling rig.
sentences.cn: 柴油发电机组是海洋钻井平台中的重要设备.

sentences.en: If the hicks back home could see me in this rig , they'd have a fit!
sentences.cn: 假如家乡那些大老粗见我这副打扮, 他们会惊厥的!

sentences.en: It is too dangerous to rig the oars as a drag if you must sleep.
sentences.cn: 如果你一定要睡觉的话,把桨绑起来拖在水里可就太危险啦.

sentences.en: Oil suddenly jetted out of rig number four.
sentences.cn: 油突然从四号钻井中喷了出来.

sentences.en: Our camping rig includes cooking pots and sleeping bags.
sentences.cn: 我们的野营装备包括锅子和睡袋.

sentences.en: Some international observers have claimed the election was rigged.
sentences.cn: 一些国际观察员声称选举受到操纵。

sentences.en: The children ran a rig upon the new boy.
sentences.cn: 孩子们作弄新来的男孩.

sentences.en: The oiler steered, and the little boat made good way with her new rig.
sentences.cn: 加油工掌着舵, 小船靠着这新装备快速前进.

sentences.en: The rig is moored in position.
sentences.cn: 这种钻机的位置是锚定的.

sentences.en: The severe conditions hampered attempts to pull the vessel free of the rig.
sentences.cn: 恶劣的天气情况使得把那艘船拉离钻塔的努力很难奏效。

sentences.en: The ship was fully rigged and ready to sail.
sentences.cn: 船已装备就绪，等待起航。

sentences.en: There is some trouble in the borehole. Don't leave the rig floor.
sentences.cn: 井下出现复杂情况, 不要离开钻台.

sentences.en: They rig their domestic markets in favour of local businesses.
sentences.cn: 他们操纵国内市场以使当地企业受益。

sentences.en: We'll plant automated sensors here, here, and here, and rig them through a central relay here.
sentences.cn: 我们把自动化的传感器安置在这儿, 这儿和这儿, 在这儿安装上中心继电器.

sentences.en: What happens when we get more than 3200 tons of water in this rig?
sentences.cn: 如果涌入的水超过三千两百吨会怎样?

sentences.en: Where are you going in that rig-out?
sentences.cn: 你穿着那身打扮要去哪里？
